positions.title: Loading positions from a file
positions.warning: Previously entered positions will be deleted.

Process.Light.Import.InvalidFileExtensio.title: Invalid file format. Select the file with the description of the positions with the extension ".xlsx".

owner.title: The file does not match the specification for the positions in the request. possible reason: • The specification is specified for another request or group of items.
owner.download: Download the current template and download again.

participant.title: The file does not meet the specification for the positions in the request. The file does not match the template. Possible reasons:
participant.text:
• The file does not contain a specification for items
• The request has been updated and your offer is outdated
• Table columns or customer data changed
• The specification is specified for another request or group of items
participant.download: Download the offer template and download it again.

Process.Light.Import.FileHasErrors.title: Positions containing errors are not loaded. Fix the errors and re-download.
Process.Light.Import.FileHasErrors.download: Download the file with the error description

questionnaire.title: Uploading a questionnaire from a file
questionnaire.warning: Previously entered questions will be deleted.

Process.Light.Import.InvalidFileExtensio.title: Invalid file format. Select the questionnaire file with the extension ".xlsx".

Process.Light.Import.InvalidFile.title: The file does not match the template. download the current template and repeat the download.

Process.Light.Import.FileHasErrors.title: Questions with errors are not uploaded. Fix the errors and re-upload.

empty.text: No additional columns have been added

import_export.download: Download the template to fill in

documents.title: Allow attaching documents to the item
documents.text: Enabled option gives members the ability to attach documents to items
